description:
Fearing what might happen knowing that the God of Destruction is awake, the Kaioushin urge Kaiou-sama to ensure that Son Gokuu never finds out about Beerus. However, Gokuu overhears the conversation and becomes curious. Back in his temple, Beerus and Whis continue their search for the Super Saiyan God. They soon learn of Son Gokuu and his feats and decide to pay him and Kaiou-sama a visit. Meanwhile, back on Earth, Gokuu`s friends and family members begin gathering on the cruise ship for Bulma`s birthday party except for Vegeta who is still training to overpower Gokuu and everyone else in the Universe.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Where`s the Rest of the Dream?! In Search of the Super Saiyan God!
Wie geht der Traum weiter? – Finde den Super-Saiyajin-Gott!
Yume no Tsuzuki wa Doko Da!? Super Saiyajin God o Sagase!
¿Cómo continúa el Sueño? ¡En Busca del Super Saiyan Dios!
¿En dónde está la otra mitad del sueño? ¡Buscando al Súper Saiyajin Fase Dios!
夢の続きはどこだ!? 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドを探せ!
